attributes.action: Allow Parliament a free vote on whether or not we should implement Article 50.
attributes.background:
I do not believe that the referendum result provides a suitably large mandate to signal withdrawal from the European Union.

Parlaiment is sovereign and with an event with such repurcussions for our country we should hear it's voice.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
